Riekan takes the hit, all right, but he's sturdy enough to maintain 
his point-blank position long enough to fire his harpoon gun.  At 
this range, Ragnar could be ripped wide open by such a blast.  Fury 
whirls his blade, waiting for another opening.

Most of the fire impacts on Pumpskin's self-regenerating limbs, but 
Blackfang scores a solid body hit with his last shot - and this wound 
doesn't close itself up right away, betraying the relative 
vulnerability of his torso.

"Hee hee, you're a perceptive one!" Pumpskin chuckles as he flails in 
both directions, looking to give each of them a two-tentacle hug.  
All four appendages stretch out to their maximum length again.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Ragnar sidestepped and avoided the knife, but Riekan fell down hard 
on 
> him.
> 
> Ragnar muttered: Honorless fools...
> 
> He fired his autocannon on the bot right on top of him.
> 
> Katya jerked backward as the metal foot caught her. She regained 
> enough to fire her large laser.
> 
> Blackfang took his shotgun and aimed. He fired four blasts at the 
> pumpkin abomination. But then, he realized that it bore the Maximal 
> insignia and a unit designation he seemed to remember.
> 
> Blackfang: Shit! You're a member of the Maximal Iron Squad!
